title: 33. "R-E-S-P-E-C-T" Maintaining Boundaries with Family During the Holidays
description:
In this episode, we talk about my top 5 ways to maintain boundaries with family during the holidays. We talk about how to navigate feelings of doubt surrounding boundaries during the holidays and how to put yourself first. 

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

Click here to grab your free guide on the 5 Daily Tips on How to Stop Caring What Other People Think
